block.p: MONTROSE--David, age 60, of NYC and East Hampton, on April 5, 2007. Beloved husband of Donna. Loving son, brother, brother-in-law, uncle, cousin and son-in-law. Friend to many. President of Montrose Surveying Company and highly respected among business colleagues. Graveside funeral service, Sunday, 10 am, Cedar Lawn Cemetery, East Hampton. Memorial Donations may be made to V.N.S.N.Y. HospiceCare and/ or Gilda's Club.
